headline: Cigna (CI): Net Profit Margin Jumps to 2.3%, Reinforcing Value-Focused Bullish Narratives
summary: Cigna Group (CI) saw its net profit margin rise to 2.3% from 1.3% a year ago, while earnings growth accelerated 102.3% year over year, marking a sharp reversal from its five-year average decline of 11.9%. The company’s forecasted earnings growth of 6.41% per year trails the broader market, but investors may take comfort in the stock’s 10.6x price-to-earnings ratio, its position below fair value estimates, and its appealing dividend profile. With only one minor risk flagged and a handful of...
